Sentence: In the meantime, Rosaura and Pedro have returned to the ranch and have produced a second child, Esperanza
The night that John officially asks Pedro to bless the marriage, Pedro corners Tita in a hidden room and makes love to her (Esperanza), taking her (Esperanza) virginity
With Rosaura dead and Esperanza married, Tita and Pedro are finally free to express their love in the open
Once she (Esperanza) does, she (Esperanza) realizes that Pedro has already crossed over

Wanting desperately to be with him (Pedro), Tita attempts to ignite her (Esperanza) inner fire by eating the candles that had lit the room until they extinguished themselves at the moment of Pedro's death
When she (Esperanza) succeeds in recreating the climate of true passion, she (Esperanza) reenters the luminous tunnel and meets Pedro in the spirit world
